entities.description: Labels of the possible responses for the survey item.
The count of responses from the total sample without weighting adjustments.
Short description for each label used in the response category.
The total number of responses received for the survey item.
Statistical summary including mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation for the numeric variable.

relationships.description: Associates the survey item with its possible response categories.
Associates each response category with the unweighted frequency count.
Provides a description for each response label.
Defines the total number of responses received for the item.
Associates the survey item with its summary statistics.
Lists detailed statistical values such as mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
